name: e2e-tauri-v1
description: End-to-end testing app for Zubridge Tauri v1

scripts.clean: pnpm clean:output && pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml ./dist ./src-tauri/target
scripts.dev:ui: cross-env WATCH_UI=true vite build && cross-env WATCH_UI=true pnpm tauri dev
scripts.build:basic: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=basic vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=basic pnpm tauri build -- --verbose
